name: div
features: Tunnel-Belt Loop Waist: Provides a secure, adjustable fit for added comfort & stability
Two-Snap Fly Closure: Fly front with extended two-snap closure for a clean, professional look & easy wear
Secure Storage: Set-in back pockets with button closures offer safe storage for small items
Double Knee: Dual-layer knee construction enhances durability & provides extra protection during play
Elastic Bottom: Elasticized leg openings ensure a snug fit and keep the pants in place during movement
Embroidered Logo: Adds a touch of style & brand authenticity
Double Knit Fabric: Lightweight yet durable construction built for performance & longevity
DRYLITE Technology: Dual filament yarn wicks moisture away from the body to keep you cool & dry during play
